title: France 19th-Century Relais & Château Luxury in Limousin with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Embrace French joie de vivre in renowned Relais & Château style at La Chapelle Saint Martin, a 19th-century countryside retreat in France's Limousin region. Beautifully restored as an ode to its historic surroundings, this peaceful oasis of regional elegance is located a 20-minute drive from Limoges - halfway between Paris and Toulouse.

This charming maison effortlessly offers modern comfort in an antique bourgeois setting. Come for the visual feast of striking artwork and aesthetically pleasing designs and stay for the tranquility, surrounded by 35 hectares of 200-year-old trees. Evenings can be whiled await at the onsite Le Saint-Martin, Gastronomic Restaurant, a Michelin-starred feast for the senses serving impeccable local cuisine. Spend sunny days by the outdoor pool or request a gourmet picnic hamper to take on the road and enjoy amid the magnificent surrounding countryside.
offer_address: 33 Rte Saint-Martin du Fault, 87510 Nieul, France
